channel.title: Broken Sequences in HL2
channel.description: I own Half Life 2, from The Orange Box. The game runs good except for one thing. Some events, like the vortigaunt putting the gun on the airboat or the Panels rising from the teleporter at the end do not happen. What can I do to fix this?

item.title: Broken Sequences in HL2
item.dc:creator: Scentedwiind
item.description:
Wow… suggestions from the internet never work. I suppose miracles do happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Broken Sequences in HL2
item.dc:creator: Calebmcghee
item.description:
Thanks. I took your advice and tested it out and it worked like a charm.

Read full topic

item.title: Broken Sequences in HL2
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Try running a defrag on the GCFs with
Half-life 2> Properties> Local game files> Defragment Game Cache files in your steam “games” tab.
Failing that, reinstall.

Read full topic
